Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Wotan

    1. Of those all - that Wotan call, number in good homeless men
    2. to Valhalla they go - was one-eye I know - a hobo they ken
    1. For too many of hobos have talking heads
    2. And starved nine days without bread
    1. Have you slept in the rain? 'Neath a tree?
    2. I'll show you the runes - the triangle hands
    1. And all hobo's of old - the railroad rode
    2. You think Sleipnir was fast as the line?
    1. And a Norse god of old - should know how to drink
    2. So who would you have? - The drunk or the erg'?
    1. For a thief and a king - a warrior's dirge!

– Molossus Spondee

Oct 23, 2022 • poem • 2018

Gacc/Gock The Wrath That Might Have Been
